item.title: Random Variable
item.description: Random Variable # Random variable is a function which maps the outcome of a simple random experiment to a real number. denoted by capital italized roman characters like X or Y Suppose that a coin is tossed twice so that the sample space is S={HH, HT, TH, TT}. Let X represent the number of heads that can come up. With each sample point we can associate a number for X as shown below.
